bibl.title: The Christians in the Later Roman Empire.
bibl.note: 45 Decian "libelli" and several more recently published papyri reflect the policy of Valerian, Diocletian and Galerius toward the Christianization of Egypt. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 76 (2007) No. 11885.
bibl.seg: NOBBS Alanna M., The Christians in the Later Roman Empire.

45 Decian "libelli" and several more recently published papyri reflect the policy of Valerian, Diocletian and Galerius toward the Christianization of Egypt. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 76 (2007) No. 11885.
